head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VARDY, MICHAEL MOSHE, PH.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VARDY, MICHAEL MOSHE, PH.D.

block.p: VARDY--Michael Moshe, Ph.D., 79, died peacefully April 1st. Devoted husband of the late Edith, beloved father of Joel, Iris and Michael, proud grandfather of Noah, Alex, Sophia, Andrew, David. Zionist who opposed Nazi occupation in Budapest to join struggle for Israeli independence. Associate Clinical Professor, Department of Psychiatry, Albert Einstein College of Medicine. Accomplished Psychoanalyst, teacher, mentor, writer, researcher, intellectual. We will miss you Aba.
